Comment: I think we have to prepare for that eventuality. His presidency has thus far been unprecedented for a functioning democracy and, alarmingly, rather typical for a dictatorship going through the initial steps of overthrowing a democracy. First they replace all the generals and key government officials with incompetent sycophantic loyalists (check), then they cow the media by attempting to discredit them (check), then they cow the opposition rendering them ineffective (the democrats basically checked themselves), then they refuse to obey the courts and try to replace (or remove) judges (work in progress). There are more steps (jailing journalists and politicians etc), but there is a pattern of behaviour here which should be ringing alarm bells.
Author: Newleafto
